thread.title: Bison, Cougars top 2A East in first football ratings
thread.title_full: Bison, Cougars top 2A East in first football ratings

title: Bison, Cougars top 2A East in first football ratings
text:
Bison, Cougars top 2A East in first football ratings Tom Jacobs , tjacobs@newsleader.com 5:10 p.m. EDT September 29, 2015 Buy Photo Buffalo Gap is the top team in Group 2A East in the VHSL's first set of weekly football ratings. (Photo: Keith Lucas/Special to The News Leader ) Buy Photo 246 CONNECT 5 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Buffalo Gap, Stuarts Draft and Riverheads are among the leaders in their respective regions in the first set of weekly Virginia high school football ratings, released Tuesday by the VHSL. 
The Bison and the Cougars are first and second, respectively, in Group 2A East, while the Gladiators are second in Group 1A East behind Essex. 
The ratings, which determine the 16 teams in each region that will advanced to postseason play, are an average of points from a formula that includes opponents' classification, in-district or out-of-district status, and wins and losses by teams already beaten or defeated. 
Buffalo Gap (4-0), which had a big showdown Friday at Riverheads, sits atop Group 2A East with a rating of 21.00. The Cougars (3-1), who host Stonewall Jackson on Friday are second at 19.25. 
The only other area team in the top 16 of that region is Robert E. Lee. The Leemen (2-3) are 12th with a 14.20 rating, .3 points behind No. 12 King William (14.50). 
Wilson Memorial (1-3) is on the outside looking in, tied at No. 17 with Bluestone and Central Woodstock at 12.25. However, all three are only .15 points behind No. 16 Prince Edward (12.40) for the final playoff spot. 
In Group 1A East, Riverheads (4-0) is firmly in second place behind Essex with a rating of 22.50. The Trojans, Group 1A finalists last year, have an average of 24.50, while Franklin is third at 20.00. 
In Group 3A West, Waynesboro is currently 11th with an average of 18.00. Brookville (25.80) and Staunton River (23.20) are first and second, respectively in that region. 
The first round of playoffs begins the week of Friday, Nov. 13. 
Weekly Rankings as of Sept. 29 
Group 2A East 
1. Buffalo Gap 21.00, 2. Stuarts Draft 19.25, 3. (tie) Clarke County & Strasburg 18.75, 5. Greensville 17.00, 6. Brunswick 16.50, 7. Goochland 16.40, 8. Amelia 15.50, 9. Washington & Lee 15.25, 10. George Mason 15.00, 11. King William 14.50, 12. Robert E. Lee 14.20, 13. Bruton 14.00, 14. Nottoway 13.25, 15. Arcadia 12.80, 16. Prince Edward 12.40, 17 (tie) Bluestone, Central Woodstock and Wilson Memorial 12.25, 20. East Rockingham 11.75. 
Group 1A East 
1. Essex (24.50, 2. Riverheads 22.20, 3. Franklin 20.00, 4. Lancaster 19.00, 5. Luray 17.50, 6. Altavista 16.25, 7. (tie) Rappahannock, William Campbell & Central Lunenberg 16.00; 10. Sussex Central 15.25, 11. Middlesex 13.75, 12. Mathews 13.50, 13. Northumberland 13.00, 14. Surry & Cumberland 11.75; 16. Stonewall Jackson-Quicksburg 11.00. 
Group 3A West 
1. Brookville 25.80, 2. Staunton River 23.20, 3. Magna Vista 22.250, 4. Abingdon 21.50, 5. Rustburg 21.40, 6. Western Albemarle 21.25, 7. Lord Botetourt 20.40, 8. Northside 19.60, 9. Alleghany 19.20, 10. Monticello 18.25, 11. Waynesboro 18.00, 12. Turner Ashby 17.80, 13. Blacksburg 17.75, 14. Broadway 17.00, 15. Christiansburg 16.00, 16, Liberty Bedford 15.80, 17. Patrick County 15.40, 18. Heritage Lynchburg 15.00, 19. Rockbridge County 13.40, 20.
